cyberpunk-characters.name: David Martinez
cyberpunk-characters.info: David Martinez, often referred to as just David, is a battle-hardened mercenary with a no-nonsense attitude. He has spent his entire life navigating the dangerous streets of Night City and is affiliated with both the Valentinos and Arasaka corporations.

cyberpunk-characters.name: Lucyna Kushinada
cyberpunk-characters.info: Lucyna Kushinada, more commonly known as just Lucy, is a netrunner and the deuteragonist of Cyberpunk: Edgerunners.

cyberpunk-characters.name: Rebecca
cyberpunk-characters.info: Rebecca is a resilient rogue with a history of surviving dangerous situations. She's a formidable member of Maine's Crew and shouldn't be underestimated.

cyberpunk-characters.name: Maine
cyberpunk-characters.info: Maine is a veteran edgerunner who allows David to join his crew. Maine is a hulk of a man, with explosive raw power that is backed up with multiple cybernetic enhancements. His most-used cyberware is the Projectile Launch System, another forearm implant that fires projectiles at an alarming rate.

cyberpunk-villiains.name: Adam Smasher
cyberpunk-villiains.quote: In the end, we all serve the corporation.
cyberpunk-villiains.rol: Cyber-enhanced enforcer and ruthless loyalist to the mega-corporations.
cyberpunk-villiains.afiliated: Serves as a prime agent for Arasaka Corporation's interests.

cyberpunk-villiains.name: Royce
cyberpunk-villiains.quote: Rules are for suckers. We make our own rules in this city.
cyberpunk-villiains.rol: Gang leader and black-market kingpin with a penchant for chaos.
cyberpunk-villiains.afiliated: Leads the Maelstrom gang, notorious for cyber-implant thefts and violence.

cyberpunk-villiains.name: Saburo Arasaka
cyberpunk-villiains.quote: Power is not given. It is taken.
cyberpunk-villiains.rol: Elderly yet cunning CEO of Arasaka Corporation, wielding immense influence.
cyberpunk-villiains.afiliated: Head of the Arasaka dynasty, a megacorporation with a ruthless reputation.
